apparatus for automatic DNA extraction or equivalent

pre-made cartridges, at least 52 sample collection tubes, at least 52 elution tubes, at least 52 columns, at least
52 extensions and holders for extensions, compatible with Automate Express apparatus for automatic DNA
extraction or equivalent, validated for forensic analysis

TITLE.P: Reagent detection kit for at least 12 genes (FII Prothrombin, FV Leiden, FV 1299, FV Cambridge, FV Y1702C, MTHFR 677, MTHFR 1298, MTR 2756, MTRR 66, FXIII Val34Leu, Beta-Fibrinogen 455 G> A and PAI-1

SHORT_DESCR.P: Reagent kit and consumables for extraction and purification of genomic DNA from human material: fresh or frozen whole blood. The extraction process must be internal lysis and fully automated, without additional steps. Transfer samples and MAG suspension from the outset to prefilled comics or plates containing all auto-extraction reagents, including at least the following components: MAG suspension, proteinase K, filter types, and elution tubes validated and compatible for clinical use. for nucleic acids InnuPure C16 touch or equivalent.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Qualitative high-affinity antibody test (Anti-SARS-COV-2) for the SARS-COV-2 virus including IgG, using a recombinant protein representing the nucleocapsid antigen by the dual antigen sandwich principle in serum or plasma. The test must be on the WHO list of emergency in vitro diagnostics associated with the detection of SARS-COV-2

SHORT_DESCR.P: Kit for molecular RNA detection of SARS-CoV-2 in clinical specimens using RT-PCR in real time, with detection of at least two targets (genes) from the viral genome, must include positive control, reaction mixture and enzymes, be CE IVD certified and compatible with 7500Real-Time PCR System or equivalent.

SUITABILITY.P: In order to prove its personal situation, the economic operator should provide the following documents
— statement that in the last 5 years no effective court verdict has been pronounced for committed criminal act
from Article 88 paragraph 1 of the PPL,
— certificate that it is not subject to bankruptcy procedure issued by competent authority,
— certificate that it is not subject to liquidation procedure issued by competent authority,
— certificate for paid taxes, contributions and other public duties by the competent authority in the country
where that economic operator is established,
— certificate from the legal entities penal registry that it is not being imposed a side sanction – prohibition to
participate in public competitions, contract award procedures and PPP award procedures,
— certificate from the legal entities penal registry that it is not being imposed a side sanction — temporary or
permanent prohibition to perform certain professional activity,
— certificate that it is not being sanctioned for misdemeanor with an effective court decision, resulting in
prohibition for pursuing professional activity or duty, i.e. temporary prohibition for performing professional activity
IV.2.2) ability of the economic operator to perform business activity — document for registered activity, certificate
for wholesale of medical products in accordance with the law on medicines and medical devices.

TECHNICAL_PROFESSIONAL_INFO.P: samples, description and / or photographs of products that are subject to delivery, and the authenticity of which the economic operator is obliged to confirm if requested by the contracting authority: description and / or photographs (catalogs) of products with clearly marked catalog numbers from the items are offered, and the reliability of which the economic operator is obliged to confirm if requested by the contracting authority.

TECHNICAL_PROFESSIONAL_MIN_LEVEL.P: samples, description and / or photographs of products that are subject to delivery, and the authenticity of which the economic operator is obliged to confirm if requested by the contracting authority: description and / or photographs (catalogs) of products with clearly marked catalog numbers from the items are offered, and the reliability of which the economic operator is obliged to confirm if requested by the contracting authority.

PERFORMANCE_CONDITIONS.P: Guarantee for quality performance of the contract: Yes [10.00%]

Condition for signing the contract with the selected most favorable bidder is providing a guarantee by the selected most favorable bidder for quality performance of the contract in the amount of 10% of the value of the contract including VAT, for contracts whose total value is over 30,000.00 denars including VAT.

Medicine,Skopje — 50 Divizija No 6, 1000, Skopje, R. MACEDONIA
